channel.title: R on Mara's World
channel.description: Recent content in R on Mara's World

item.title: Seatbelt Analysis
item.description: The following is from year ago exactly: 2020-04-05. I am digging up old work and putting it on my new website. This was some of my very first independent work. Do all Germans wear their seatbelts? Inspired by this Tweet: https://twitter.com/hspter/status/1134098154167496704 I laughed, but I did not think that this was possible. I imagined it was just playing into my acknowledged stereotype that Germany and Switzerland are impressively rule following and have a special relationship with their vehicles.
